reviewText: Purchased for a gift for a child that had already seen it but wanted their own copy. Good values and engaging for small children. Not as exciting for big kids or grownups, but it's something I can feel good about letting a child watch.

I had a Christmas reunion party and I decided a movie would be nice. Went to the library and all I saw was stuff like the grinch and Santa stuff then I saw it ozie boo. My little one loves ozie boo. So I rented it and it was a strike out! Everyone loved it.
the preschool kids sit in front of this for hours good lessons in the dvd

I rented this movie from the library and was it a hit.  I had grandchildren visiting from the age of 1,2,3,5, and 6, all were fascinated by the animation and message of this great movie.  It is a Christian movie but it is good for all religions or non-religious people.  Even the parents liked it.
